findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function allows a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account without proper validation or access control.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The transfer function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function allows a spender to withdraw a set number of tokens from a specified account without proper protection.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential exploitation.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function does not have any access control or validation, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the contract's tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap function does not have any protection mechanism, making it vulnerable to potential attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The bc25cf77 => skim(address) function does not have any protection mechanism, which could lead to unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function is unprotected, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of the contract's state.

findings.title: Unprotected deliver function
findings.description: The 'deliver' function does not have sufficient protection against unauthorized access or malicious activities.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromReward function
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInReward function
findings.description: The includeInReward function is unprotected and can be exploited.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferBothExcluded function
findings.description: The _transferBothExcluded function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromFee function
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function is unprotected and can be exploited by malicious actors.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInFee function
findings.description: The includeInFee function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected changeNumTokensSellToAddToLiquidity function
findings.description: The changeNumTokensSellToAddToLiquidity function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected setTaxFeePercent function
findings.description: The setTaxFeePercent function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to manipulate tax fees.

findings.title: Unprotected setLiquidityFeePercent function
findings.description: The setLiquidityFeePercent function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially allowing malicious actors to manipulate liquidity fees.

findings.title: Unprotected setDevFeePercent function
findings.description: The setDevFeePercent function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to manipulate the dev fee percentage.

findings.title: Unprotected setMaxTxAmout function
findings.description: The setMaxTxAmout function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function
findings.description: The setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.
